movie.title: Hellfire
movie.description_intro: Zeb Smith is a gambler with a larcenous streak, but when an itinerant preacher takes a bullet meant for him, Zeb vows to fulfill the preacher's mission of building a church. Frustrated in his attempts to get donations, Zeb attempts to capture fugitive Doll Brown in order to obtain the reward. But he finds that there's more to Doll than meets the eye. When his old friend Bucky McLean shows up gunning for Doll, Zeb sees a chance to redeem them all... one way or another.
movie.description_full: Zeb Smith is a gambler with a larcenous streak, but when an itinerant preacher takes a bullet meant for him, Zeb vows to fulfill the preacher's mission of building a church. When his old friend Bucky McLean shows up gunning for Doll, Zeb sees a chance to redeem them all... one way or another.

movies.title: Heartfall Arises
movies.summary: About an officer from special forces faces the most notorious creminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing top of business men in Southeast Asia.
movies.description_full: About an officer from special forces faces the most notorious creminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing top of business men in Southeast Asia.
movies.synopsis: About an officer from special forces faces the most notorious creminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing top of business men in Southeast Asia.

movies.title: Chaplin
movies.summary: The biography of Charlie Chaplin, filmmaker extraordinaire. From his formative years in England to his highest successes in America, Chaplin's life, work, and loves are followed. While his screen characters were extremely hilarious, the man behind "The Little Tramp" was constantly haunted by a sense of loss.

movies.title: School for Love
movies.summary: At the Conservatory of Vienna the student only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.
movies.description_full: At the Conservatory of Vienna the student only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.
movies.synopsis: At the Conservatory of Vienna the student only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.

movies.title: Wild Detective
movies.summary: A bad cop is engaged in a violent chase to catch a yakuza boss. In his absence his wife runs away with another man, who turns out to be the very same man that her husband is hunting. Once he discovers this, he loses his nerve and turns in his badge. But the chase turns into a personal vendetta where the ex-cop plans to wipe out the entire gang.
